title: Bug 49235: ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not expected
description: Bug 49235: ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not expected. The output is "MySomeClass". My code works fine on Glassfish 3.0.
OB: When executing the code, the output is "MySomeAnn" instead of the expected output "MySomeClass". This behavior is not in line with the Servlet 3.0 specification.
EB: The output should be "MySomeClass" instead of "MySomeAnn".
